action.msg: Huff... I've never done this while balancing on a fucking limo before.
Those henchmen on TV make it look so easy...
I knew you couldn't take the heat. You're already out of breath.
I'm just getting started! It's the sun in my eyes that's slowing me down, not you!
Can't see shit.
Still making excuses. I thought you would grow out of that when you left home.
Woah, didn't expect you to still hold that grudge, Hun.
If you were in MY shoes, you would too.
You know I tried EVERYTHING to make it to your show!
I just didn't expect for, y'know, the whole police thing to catch up to me.
You're still with that story? You really expect me to believe something like that?
Anyways, I'm not here just to tell you how to be a good friend.
After I learned about your whereabouts, I came after your title, nothing more than that.
Mhm. That's totally it. No grudge held.
You seem confident.
It's gotten me this far. With or without you.
Cherry, next song. Make it quicker.
You're the boss, Hun.
This chicken burger is so fucking good. Chicken... pink... raw...
Pink is good...
I am very ill.
